name: Volatility-Adjusted Momentum ETF Strategy
description: Daily long-only momentum strategy trading a universe of liquid U.S. equity ETFs. Utilises the Volatility-Adjusted Momentum signal (21-day look-back) with volume confirmation. Positions use fixed 2 % equity sizing, capped at 10 simultaneous holdings. Risk is controlled through a 1.5× ATR(14) trailing stop and a 6 % take-profit.
